results.title: An evidence-based systematic review of the off-label uses of lisinopril.

results.title: Low-dose lisinopril in normotensive men with idiopathic oligospermia and infertility: a 5-year randomized, controlled, crossover pilot study.
results.text_hl: Low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ in normotensive @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ with @DISEASE_Oligospermia @DISEASE_MESH:D009845 @@@idiopathic oligospermia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Infertility</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007246 @@@infertility@@@: a 5-year randomized, controlled, crossover pilot study.
